item.title: Possessor passive in day abilities on class info
item.dc:creator: TheButterMage
item.description:
What happened?

On the class info for Poss, the passive ‘Driven’ was also in the day abilities as the only day ability.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Ability for facelift should be there instead

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Click class portrait in a game.
  2. Change to possessor.
  3. Look at day abilities

Comments:

https://imgur.com/a/OuuDR (Image outdated)
Only appears in a game, not in the main menu
EDIT: Update 1.0.15 has changed the original image, I have also found that noble has similar issues. The following link will be updated if I find new classes with this.
https://imgur.com/a/py5hB
